credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Designs for Two Trophies: Stonecutters and Goldsmiths
medium: Pen and black ink, brush and wash, black chalk on white laid paper
description: Trophy at left, tools of mason, or stonecutter. Tablet shown with sun shining through clouds. Trophy at right, tools of goldsmiths. Tablet showing liturgical objects and a framed image of the sun, zodiac representations, and a circle drawn by a compass. In the escutcheon below is written: le lapidaire/ et/ l'orfevrerie.
name: Drawing
